title: Scaffold web app + CLI for Agent Mail kickoff
description: Create initial Next.js app skeleton and single-file Bun CLI to compose Brenner Loop prompts and send via Agent Mail.

title: Web: add corpus search + excerpt picker
description: Add full-text search over transcript/distillations and a UI to select excerpt chunks to inject into Brenner Loop prompts.

title: Orchestration: role-specific Brenner Loop templates + artifacts
description: Define role-specific prompt variants (Codex/Claude/Gemini) and produce durable artifacts (hypothesis slate, discriminative tests, assumption ledger) with storage back into the repo.

title: CLI: add inbox fetch + thread summary helpers
description: Extend brenner.ts with Agent Mail helpers: fetch inbox, read thread, summarize thread, ack messages, and basic polling.
